thread.title: Tracey

author: Tracey
title: Tracey
text: I had a few issues with the online ordering and my credit card not being accepted on the website (a little frustrating as it didn't give much information about why it was rejected despite using various cards with the same result). I called the local agent who tried to assist but couldn't. Somehow the issue miraculously solved itself after a last ditch attempt! Ordering the correct size etc online was very easy and user friendly. The wallpaper arrived so quickly and looks absolutely spectacular!
